item.title: Barcode scanner in BC - No camera!
item.description:
Crucial: As of right now (18.10.2025) the most recent android version of Business Central does not work with barcode scanning. The most recent version I found was version 4-1-2281 from 2024! Every newer version would not pick up on broadcast intents!

Introduction

The easiest way to create a functional barcode scanner integration using the default capabilities of Business Central is through the camera barcode scanner control add-in. While this works well enough, if you’re working in a warehouse environment, you probably don’t want to open the camera, scan one item, close it, and then check if the item was processed correctly. At this point, many suggest implementing a third-party module to help with warehousing and scanner integrationâ€”which is completely valid and works for most cases.
